key.title: API Key
key.description: Get the key by tapping a few times on the 'About MOTION' page under Settings in the MotionBlinds app

name.title: Name
name.description: A friendly name to identify the bridge. Defaults to the bridge's (unfriendly) MAC address

pollInterval.title: Poll Interval
pollInterval.description: Determines how often (in seconds) the plugin will proactively poll for the state of bridge devices (default: 60 sec)

deviceDefaults.title: Device Defaults
deviceDefaults.description: When set, these settings will apply to all devices (unless overridden individually per device)

stopButton.title: Add Stop Button
stopButton.description: When 'true' a switch button will be added to the accessory which when pressed will signal the curtain to stop it's motion

invertOpenClose.title: Invert Open/Close
invertOpenClose.description: Inverts the notion of opened and closed curtain (ie. is 100% considered fully closed or fully opened)

openCloseInterval.title: Open/Close Interval
openCloseInterval.description: The time (in seconds) it takes to fully open or close the curtain. This will help in determining when to force update the curtain device

mac.title: MAC Address
mac.description: The MAC address of the device (used as the device identifiers)

name.title: Name
name.description: A friendly name for the device. Defaults the the (less friendly) MAC address

stopButton.title: Add Stop Button
stopButton.description: When 'true' a switch button will be added to this accessory which when pressed will signal the curtain to stop it's motion

invertOpenClose.title: Invert Open/Close
invertOpenClose.description: Inverts the notion of opened and closed curtain (ie. is 100% considered fully closed or fully opened)

openCloseInterval.title: Open/Close Interval
openCloseInterval.description: The time (in seconds) it takes to fully open or close the curtain. This will help in determining when to force update the curtain device (default: 60 sec)
